images.description: A hot air balloon flies over a verdant landscape dotted with ancient temples at sunrise.
A serene view of a small island with a church on top, connected to the mainland by a winding path, set against the ocean.
A white sign marks the South Pole with an American flag alongside, on a vast, snowy expanse.
A stingray blends into sandy ocean bottom, its shape barely discernible except for two eyes and a slender tail.
An active volcano emitting smoke, viewed from a high vantage point with snow-capped slopes nearby.
